titleStmt.title: A late libellers folly manifested and the Christian Quakers vindicated, from the base insinuations, in a late pamphlet, subscribed G.W. By H.G.
titleStmt.author: Gouldney, Henry, 1656 or 7-1725.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting, House [sic] in White-Hart-Court in Gracecious-street-[sic] and at the Croocked-Billet [sic] in Holywell-Lane near Shoreditch,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends' Library, London.

place.placeName: the Croocked-Billet [sic] in Holywell-Lane near Shoreditch
